actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for posting information in post offices with respect to registration, voting, and communicating with lawmakers.

summary.text: Voters' Information Act - Requires the posting in a prominent place, of information in post offices with respect to registration, voting, and communicating with lawmakers, including Members of Congress, representitives of States, and the President and Vice President.

titles.title: A bill to provide for posting information in post offices with respect to registration, voting, and communicating with lawmakers.
